src:
Watch it Live: Veterans Day Parade on ABC7

05 Nov 2019, 14:46




NEW YORK -- On November 11, ABC7 honors the men and women who served with strength and courage.
Eyewitness News' Sam Champion, Michelle Charlesworth, and CeFAAN Kim host a celebration of our veterans.
Watch the Veterans Day Parade, live Monday at Noon on ABC7.

VETERANS DAY
